main_interests: History of ideas, epistemology, ethics, political philosophy
influences: Annales School, Friedrich Nietzsche, Louis Althusser, Immanuel Kant, Georges Canguilhem, Martin Heidegger, Georges Bataille, Maurice Blanchot, Søren Kierkegaard, Jean-Paul Sartre, Gaston Bachelard, Jean Hyppolite, Georges Dumézil, Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel, Jorge Luis Borges, Antonin Artaud, Karl Marx, Antonio Gramsci, Friedrich Engels, Jeremy Bentham
influenced: Giorgio Agamben, Edward Said, Pierre Bourdieu, Ian Hacking, Judith Butler, Friedrich Kittler, Arnold Davidson, Gilles Deleuze, Donna Haraway, Hubert Dreyfus, Paul Rabinow, Jacques Rancière, Hans Sluga, Nikolas Rose, Partha Chatterjee, Antonio Negri, Michael Hardt, Felix Guattari.
